com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.dhRobot

Class DHRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.entity.Entity
      • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.physicalObject.PhysicalObject
        • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.robot.Robot
          • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.dhRobot.DHRobot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkConnectionListener, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DHRobot_Arm3, DHRobot_Cartesian, DHRobot_GMF_M100, DHRobot_Mantis, DHRobot_Phybot, DHRobot_SCARA_NM, DHRobot_Sixi1, DHRobot_Thor, DHRobot_UArm, Sixi2

    public abstract class DHRobot
extends Robot
    A robot designed using D-H parameters.
    Author:
    Dan Royer
    See Also:

      • inDirectDriveMode

        protected boolean inDirectDriveMode()
        Direct Drive Mode means that we're not playing animation of any kind. That means no gcode running, no scrubbing on a timeline, or any other kind of external control.
        Returns:
        true if we're in direct drive mode.

        public abstract void sendNewStateToRobot(DHKeyframe keyframe)
        Robot is connected and ready to receive. Send the current FK values to the robot. Post-process translate the FK values and send them, along with tool state, etc.
        Parameters:
        keyframe -

      • selfCollision

        public boolean selfCollision(DHKeyframe keyframe)
        Test physical bounds of link N against all links <N-1 and all links >N+1 We're using separating Axis Theorem. See https://gamedev.stackexchange.com/questions/25397/obb-vs-obb-collision-detection
        Parameters:
        keyframe - the angles at time of test
        Returns:
        true if there are no collisions

      • getCornersForLink

        protected javax.vecmath.Point3d[] getCornersForLink(DHLink link)
        find the 8 corners of the bounding box and transform them into world space.
        Parameters:
        link - the link that contains both the model bounds and the poseCumulative.
        Returns:
        the 8 transformed Point3d.
